divs: sighting detailsmy sighting occurred in the evening on am moonless night that i can recall at approximately 8:00pm. i was sitting with my child in our driveway playing when directly north of my home in the sky (distance unknown, but at least several miles away it appeared) i noticed an extremely bright whitish\orangish round light source appear in the sky. the light remained lit for about 5 to 10 seconds and then went out. the continued to light up and go out in the same fashion at the exact same point in the sky for a number of minutes, maybe 15 to 20 minutes if i recall correctly. while i was observing this light my wife arrived home in our car and i immediately showed the light source to her, which my wife also found to be unusual and atypical. there was no sound being emitted from the light source that we could hear. while my wife and i were observing the light source we noticed two much smaller and dimmer red light orbs moving about in a circular fashion well to the side and in the distance of the larger light source. the two red orbs seemed to fly in circular patterns from a low point in the sky to a higher point in the sky, repeating this several times. we only observed the red orbs for maybe a couple of minutes before we noticed that the larger light source had gone out. we eventually notice that the two red orbs started moving closer to our home, but still high in the sky. as the red orbs got closer to our home they eventually seemed to merge with one another and disappeared. as i recall i went into my home to get my binoculars. i looked into the sky with the binoculars and observed what appeared to be a massive triangular\boomerang shaped craft fly directly over my home with absolutely no sound at all. my wife also saw the craft. the craft had no visible lights or windows, but to my recollection is seemed to somewhat translucent and\or capable of warping\bending the light of the stars around it. the craft was moving in the exact direction of tyndall afb, fl. tyndall afb is only a 20 minute drive (maybe about 8 to 10 miles from my home). the craft moved in a very smooth motion and was not traveling extremely fast nor extremely slow. if i had to guess the speed it was maybe a 120 to 150 miles per hour or so. we eventually lost sight of the craft in the distance and have never seen the craft or related phenomenon since. we were extremely anxious, curious, and excited upon seeing the strange lights in the sky and especially when we observed the craft. i did report this incident to the "ufo hunters", but never received a reply.
